mapper.sql: id, fk_user_id, social_code, enterprise_name, registered_capital, owner_name, region, owner_phone, contact_name, contact_phone, establish_time, establish_address, fund_quota, available
mapper.select: select social_code as socialCode, enterprise_name as enterpriseName, registered_capital as registeredCapital, owner_name as ownerName, region as region, street as street, owner_phone as ownerPhone, contact_name as contactName, contact_phone as contactPhone, establish_time as establishTime, establish_address as establishAddress, fund_quota as fundQuota, available as available, business_scope as businessScope from enterprise_info where enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from enterprise_info where credit_rate is null
mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_info (id, fk_user_id, social_code, enterprise_name, registered_capital, owner_name, region, owner_phone, contact_name, contact_phone, establish_time, establish_address, fund_quota, available, business_scop ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{socialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ownerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{establishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{establishAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessScope,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update enterprise_info
fk_user_id = #{fkUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
social_code = #{socialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
